channel.title: Buildalong
channel.description:
I'm going to post an image of a couple swords I drew and I want people to use the image as a reference and see what they come up with :P . (This is testing my new tablet, which I am loving so far) I'll be posting what I make as well. [spoiler][img]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/RedRibConcepts.png[/img][/spoiler]
Redemption is done, still going to work on the material a bit. [spoiler][img]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/RedemptionFinal.png[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: Buildalong
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:15, topic:540518”]Ambokile, if this picture was about a 2D graphics drawing rather then a 3D game model then it SHOULD be moved because this section isn’t for 2D works.[/quote]His post isn’t about a 2D piece of art, however he posted a 2D piece of art and it’s ridiculous to say that people can’t ask how he made it.

Read full topic

item.title: Buildalong
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I’m only going to clear this up once because apparently nobody can get their head around this for some strange reason. There was an enquiry to which section this post should be in considering the OPs picture and the discussion on the thread. I reviewed what was said and stated clearly to others what the OP had intended so that there wasn’t any confusion about what was going on here.

Ambokile, if this picture was about a 2D graphics drawing rather then a 3D game model then it SHOULD be moved because this section isn’t for 2D works.

Please focus on remaking the ideas rather then arguing about what is going on.

Read full topic

item.title: Buildalong
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

amy_webb:

if it was about his drawings in particular and how they were made then the topic would have to be moved to the graphic section.

Are you feeling okay? If someone answers a post in the Server Help section with a snippet of code, that post doesn’t need moving to the Snippets section. If someone answers a post in the Tutorial section with a question, that post doesn’t need moving to the Server Help section. If someone wants to update their thread in the Server Advertisement section to describe a new feature, that post doesn’t need moving to the Server Development section.

Read full topic

This thread is the the RS models section, if it was about his drawings in particular and how they were made then the topic would have to be moved to the graphic section.[/quote] People can still ask how he made them.

item.title: Buildalong
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

naseem142:

What did you use to draw those swords? They look too good to be made on a tablet

Was busy on RuneScape this weekend (Double xp weekend :P).

I used a Turcom TS-6610 Graphics Drawing Tablet to draw the swords. If you are serious about getting into graphic design I HIGHLY recommend this tablet. It is really inexpensive (I think I paid $50 for it at the time) and the workflow is so much better than using a mouse. As in if feels more natural :P. I have a lot of improving to do however when it comes to drawing.

Read full topic
